# RoomBuilder.ConfigurationOptions

**Structure**

Options that configure a room builder.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ConfigurationOptions
```

## Overview

The `options` argument to the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder] initializer [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder/init(options:)] is of this type.

## Creating a configuration option

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a configuration option with the specified raw value.
- **rawValue**: A raw value for a configuration option.

## Choosing a configuration option

- **beautifyObjects**: An option that instructs the captured room to enhance its look.

## Creating a room builder

- **init(options:)**: Creates a room builder using the specified options.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- SetAlgebra
